EmailTemplate.subject: Your December Issue of Customer Connect is Here
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CUSTOMER CONNECT DECEMBER 2019
It’s the end of the year and I would like to THANK YOU for your continued support as a customer.
I hope you have a great holiday and new year!
As always, If you need assistance please feel free to contact me. Did You Know?
Field Service Engineer Profile: Bill Nelson Customers Turn to Flight Management System (FMS) Expert for Help Lead Field Service Engineer Bill Nelson knows avionics. He’s got more than 35 years of experience, dating back to his days in the U.S. Marine Corps where he maintained radar systems on the legendary McDonnell Douglas F-4 Phantom, which he calls “the greatest airplane ever to grace the skies.” Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2019/12/field-service-engineer-knows-fms?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_cps&utm_content=customer-connect-newsletter]]>
Announcing the 2020 Operator Conference Dates The Honeywell Operator Conferences provide a great opportunity to meet face to face with Honeywell representatives and fellow customers in the business and general aviation (BGA) industry around the world. Join Honeywell in 2020 as we host over 61 events worldwide and reach over 2100 customers. Register today <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/operator-conferences?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_cps&utm_content=customer-connect-newsletter]]>
Technical Support Video of the MonthIn this months’ Technical Video segment, we’re featuring the most watched video on the TFE731 Fan Disc Inspection. This video is an overview of how to check if a TFE731-20 Fan Hub has the correct fit. Watch the video: TFE731 Fan Disc Inspection <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/videos/tfe731-fan-disc-inspection?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_cps&utm_content=customer-connect-newsletter]]> Visit Honeywell Aerospace <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_cps&utm_content=customer-connect-newsletter]]> to access the Technical Knowledge Center's thousands of articles and videos to help you solve technical issues, parts ordering, your order status and much more.
Honeywell Aims to Make Things Easy for Customers Whether you’re a business jet pilot, aircraft owner, director of maintenance, front line mechanic or purchasing manager, Todd Owens has a message for you: “We want to make it fast, seamless and extremely easy for customers to do business with Honeywell.” Read More <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2019/12/honeywell-aims-to-make-things-easy-for-customers?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_cps&utm_content=customer-connect-newsletter]]> Jazmin A Meza
Customer Support Manager Mobile: + 52 686-119-3062 Email: Jazmin.Meza@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Jazmin.Meza@Honeywell.com]]>
